Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip: The command the bot will respond to

AntiSnipe.label: Toggles a slow adding system.
AntiSnipe.tooltip: Causes the bot to add points slowly to avoid snipers.

voteMaximum.label: Maximum vote amount
voteMaximum.tooltip: The limit that users will hit when voting.

dynamicCooldown.label: Dynamic Cooldown
dynamicCooldown.tooltip: Amount of logs used determines cooldown duration.

continuousVoting.label: Continuous voting
continuousVoting.tooltip: Allows users to continuously vote for an option

get_cooldown.label: get_cooldown
get_cooldown.tooltip: Display the user specified user's current cooldown, or returns false if they aren't on cooldown.

PointName.label: Points name
PointName.tooltip: What your points display as in the text responses.

ResultName.label: Result name
ResultName.tooltip: What your vote results display as in text responses.

SilentAdds.label: Add silently?
SilentAdds.tooltip: Do you want continuous adds to be silent or not?

CheckOptionsCommand.label: Display options command?
CheckOptionsCommand.tooltip: What command will the chat use to display all options?

Decay.label: Decay
Decay.tooltip: Applies decay to vote values if they aren't touched within a certain time.

Decay_Days.label: Decay Days
Decay_Days.tooltip: The number of days before decay begins

Decay_Amount.label: Decay Amount
Decay_Amount.tooltip: The amount that decay removes from a vote each time it's triggered.
